metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Hastar Biggs - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group2_Prisoner2 ec0de12d-4a2f-4683-bb11-91473ec3577c - (37; 39; 70)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Hastar Biggs
0.text: It's... it's over, right? There's not more... cutting? Thank Gond.

1.speaker: Hastar Biggs
1.text: Bastard Grindo... Carpentry could never be good enough for my brother, could it? Just had to work in a Gondian forge.
